reviewText:
Death in Venice has become a cult-movie. This film is not about sex og homosexuality as many people think, it is about eternal beauty and pure love for beauty. Some say the film is a portrait of the composer Gustav Mahler in his last days, and the resemblance between the composer and the main role is striking. The adagietto (2nd mov) from Mahler's 5th Symphony is the theme of the movie.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CFQQsu6VBYA
